name: Name of Client Engagement
description: This dashboard is a place for our client to access the latest versions of all deliverables from the Skookum team. Documents will be updated to the most recent version as changes are needed.

deliverables.name: POC Native App - Beacon Proximity Detections
deliverables.description: The documentation says Beacon, but open to all the other options, start considering options from Scratch.

deliverables.name: iOS App Hi Fidelities
deliverables.description: Application flow that includes our unique chat interface with a clean and easy to use standard UI existing in conjunction with it

deliverables.name: iOS App Hi Fidelities
deliverables.description: Original Sketch file with multiple pages of wireframes, hi fidelities, icons and assets

heroes.name: Rob Luke
heroes.description: Designers are responsible for usability, layout and visual design of the product. Other responsibilities include stakeholder presentations, design workshop direction and adhering to brand guidelines.

heroes.name: Danielle Long
heroes.description: Product Strategists are responsible for uncovering business objectives, understanding user needs, translating those needs into prioritized features and conveying the product vision.

heroes.name: Trey Robinson
heroes.description: Engineering Consultants are responsible for uncovering current technology state, defining constraints and mitigating risk in order to establish an overall technical recommendation.
